name: Math Rocks Pinball GMTK
description:
In Math Rocks Pinball you take on the role of a retired hero Ribbon Rabbit as she dusts off her old equipment in order to save her home. An enemy from her past has returned to take his revenge, cursing Ribbon and capturing her family, friends, & neighbors. Using a variety of weapons, skills, and magical artifacts, can you fight through the army monsters between you and the innocent? Made in 50 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022!

Controls:

  • A - Left Flipper
  • D - Right Flipper
  • Left Click - Dash
  • Right Click - Halt
  • Esc - Pause
